name: Jurassic Monster World
summary: Jurassic Monster World is a mobile game like you've never seen before. Battle metal-plated monster dinos in a post-apocalyptic world! A synchronized 5x5 PvP free-to-play action shooter with different modes! Control beasts on land or in the sky, fully mechanized, augmented or organic: the choice is yours! Tame and command dozens of blood-thirsty metal hunters ready to destroy anything in their paths to win!
